Mohammed Simsimieh

Engineer Developer Designer

- Introduction

Frontend Developer and Designer, based in Jeddah

Electrical & Computer Engineer whos able to play a key role throughout the project development/support life cycle of a project to ensure that quality solutions meet business objectives.

Hard-working web developer with a flair for creating elegant solutions in the least amount of time. Developed a food recipe webapp, geolocation workout website and video streaming site. Passionate about software architecture and cloud computing. Regular pursuer of web development news and technologies.

- About

Brief Summary

Possessing a good team spirit, deadline orientated and having the ability to organize and present complex solutions clearly and accurately.

I enjoy being challenged and engaging with projects that require me to work outside my comfort and knowledge set, as continuing to learn new languages and development techniques.


Skills & Experince

I develop responsive websites that are fast, easy to use and built with best practices. The main area of my expertise is front-end development, HTML, CSS , JS, ReactJS, building small and medium web apps, custom plugins, features, animations, and coding interactive layouts.

  • Languages: Java, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Python, C, Assembly, SQL, WordPress.
  • Frameworks: Redux, AngularJS, Android Studio, Semantic UI.
  • Libraries/API: React, Lodash, Leaflet, Bootstrap, YouTube.
  • Tools: Git, Webpack, Babel, Parcel, NPM, APIs Integration, REST.
  • Platform: Windows, Linux.
  • Database: MySQL.

Visit my LinkedIn profile for more details or just contact me.

  • Design & Development

    Clean, modern designs - optimized for fast page loading speed.

  • Mobile-friendly

    A responsive design makes your website accessible to all users, regardless of their device.

  • Analytics

    Get insights into who is browsing your site so that you can make smarter business decisions.

  • Search Engine Optimization

    If a website has good SEO, it'll attract a greater number of webpage visitors by showing up high enough in search engine result pages.

    Custom WordPress theme and plugin development. Easily update content without knowing how to code.
